column3: Traffic;Tbong Khmum: At 9:20 pm on May 19
column5: a crash happened when two young men drove a Yamaha motorcycle without a license plate into a water tank. The incident took place in Chup commune
column6: Tbong Khmum district.------ The two men
column11: suffered minor injuries. According to witnesses
column12: the two men were riding at high speed as the managed to hit the water tank that was on the side of the road next to a construction site.------Police took away the moto and the men were carted off to hospital. ------https://kbn.news/archives/123286
